pageTitle: Lapierre Zesty Mountain Bikes | Compare & Buy | Evans Cycles
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {3810=In 2014, the new Lapierre Zesty range of mountain bikes gets bold and expresses its playful side on the descents. The bike gets a new geometry: a shorter seat tube makes using a dropper post easier, longer chainstays, stiffer bottom bracket and head tube for increased versatility and to maximize the ride.}
textBeforeTable: (1 review) Lapierre Zesty 914 2013 Mountain Bike compare Compare the Lapierre Zesty Range A bike you can take absolutely anywhere and know it will get you through Electronic adaptive damping for the ultimate in new tech One of the best just got better Our Verdict Electronic adaptive suspension on EI models 12x142mm thru axles OST+ 140mm suspension system Key Features Its ultra light carbon or alloy OST+ 140 mm frame is e:i shock compatible and has internal cable routing. Other improvements include a 12x142 thru-axle, 150 mm Fork and components designed to take on the entire mountain, not just one part of it.
